sentences.en: a pine nut
sentences.cn: 松子

sentences.en: Each has his own hard nut to crack.
sentences.cn: 各有一本难念的经.

sentences.en: Getting out there is in many ways the hardest nut to crack.
sentences.cn: 从很多方面来说，出去交际是最难以做到的事了。

sentences.en: He's a tough nut to crack.
sentences.cn: 他是个很难说服的人.

sentences.en: I have a nut to crack with you.
sentences.cn: 我有件棘手的事情要同你商量.

sentences.en: I told him what she had said about him and he did his nut.
sentences.cn: 我把她议论他的话告诉了他,他大发雷霆.

sentences.en: Printing visiting cards on a thirty - inch press is using a sledgehammer to crack a nut.
sentences.cn: 在30英寸印刷机上印名片简直是大材小用.

sentences.en: roasted nuts
sentences.cn: 烘坚果

sentences.en: Take your spanner, and tighten the nut.
sentences.cn: 把你的扳手拿来, 把螺帽拧紧.

sentences.en: The Daily Express describes Dr Carey as a pretty tough nut.
sentences.cn: 《每日快报》把凯里医生说成是特别难对付的家伙。

sentences.en: The most effective new botanicals are extracts from cola nut and marine algae.
sentences.cn: 这种极其有效的新型植物制剂是从可乐果和海藻中提炼出来的。

sentences.en: The nut has worked off.
sentences.cn: 螺帽已经脱落了.

sentences.en: The nut shell is very strong, I can't crack it.
sentences.cn: 核桃壳很硬, 我不能弄破它.

sentences.en: the nuts and bolts of public policy.
sentences.cn: 公共利益准则的具体细节。

sentences.en: This is really a hard nut to crack.
sentences.cn: 这事真扎手.

sentences.en: This old nut won't bite [ grip ] .
sentences.cn: 这个旧螺母咬不住 扣儿.

sentences.en: Use a wrench to loosen the nut.
sentences.cn: 用活动扳手将螺帽拧松。

sentences.en: We heard your sister doing her nut.
sentences.cn: 我们听到你妹妹在大发脾气。

sentences.en: We were sitting round the fire cracking nuts (= opening them ).
sentences.cn: 我们围坐在火炉边夹碎坚果。

sentences.en: You must be off your nut, going out in the weather like this.
sentences.cn: 你在这样的天气出去一定是疯了!

words.tran_cn: 多坚果的；产坚果的；古怪的

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)难以对付的人；可怕的人

phrases.phrase: a tough (或 hard) nut to crack
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)难以解决的问题；棘手的事情；劲敌
[英国口语](前常与 can’t 连用)一点也，根本
n. 可乐果（产于南美或非洲，可乐树所结的果子，含咖啡因，用于制药或饮料）
澳洲坚果；夏威夷果；昆士兰果
坚果破壳器，坚果脱壳机；胡桃钳
大胆果断的人；暴躁的人

phrases.phrase: use (或 take) a sledgehammer to crack a nut

trans.tran_cn: 螺母，螺帽，坚果，坚果果仁，难对付的人，[乐]弓根
trans.tran_en: a dry brown fruit inside a hard shell, that grows on a tree
